headline: Does the Recent Mondelez Buyback Program Signal a Stronger Outlook for 2025?
summary: If you have been following Mondelez International lately, you are probably asking yourself the classic investor question: is now the right time to buy, hold, or move on? The snack food giant’s stock has certainly been on a journey, with price action that invites a closer look at where things might head next. Recent weeks have seen the stock slip a bit, down 1.9% over the past seven days and off 1.3% for the month, but that follows a year where the share price has dropped a notable 10.4%. Even...
